Title: Fatal Attraction
Actors: Michael Douglas, Glenn Close, Anne Archer, Ellen Hamilton Latzen
Plot: Happily married New York lawyer Dan Callagher has an affair with his colleague Alex, and the two enjoy a love weekend while Dan's wife and kid are away. But Alex will not let go of him, and she will stop at nothing to have him for herself. Just how far will she go to get what she wants?
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 16 nominations.
